messages.messageBody:
http://www.imdb.com/find?tt=on;nm=on;mx=20;q=shinsengumi
came up with some stuff

"The Surviving Shinsengumi" (Ikinokotta Shinsengumi)1932
wow 17 years after historical Saitou dies...I don't even care if these
films are subtitled or not...I'd love to see them:) I'm sure some
university/studio in Japan owns copies...at least I hope so
